headline: Helping advisors grow their share of the IT spend in the channel.
summary:
Accomplished professional focused on helping solve my customers' business challenges with innovative solutions that exceed their desired outcomes through the appropriate experience. Experienced in building new revenue streams within existing business models. I thrive in fast paced environments where teamwork and winning are key parts of the culture.

Specialties: Channel, Business Development, Client Services, Customer Success, Lead Generation, Alliance/Partnerships, Start ups, Telecom, Cloud, SaaS, Strategic Accounts, National Accounts

Open to all ideas about partnering. Feel free to set up an appointment with me: 

https://app.hubspot.com/meetings/billvv

experiences.title: Director, Strategic Sales
experiences.description: Leading teams that help recruit, re-engage and grow our advisors' businesses through AppDirect's full service solution stack and unique GTM paths. #Channel #Cloud #Cybersecurity #SaaS

experiences.title: Regional Vice President, Strategic Partner Programs
experiences.description:
(acquired by AppDirect Feb 2023)

Led a team of Channel Managers focused nationally on acquiring new partners as well as expanding existing partner sales thru TBI's Partner Referral Program, Call Center Partner Program and Inside Channel Management team. Stood up TBI's Mobility Practice.

experiences.title: Director, Business Development
experiences.description: Helped utilities improve customer experience (CX) and capture incremental revenues leading to improved NPS scores by aligning innovative contact center solutions to assist their customer base. Led initiatives to cross sell telecom solutions into the utility customer base.

experiences.title: Sr. Director
experiences.description:
(acquired Acceller in 2014)

Bridgevine powered customer acquisition of telecom and cable home services from Comcast, Time Warner Cable, AT&T, DIRECTV and other major brands through its next generation SaaS technology. Drove the partner success initiatives focused on the efforts to increase account sales and improve performance among outsourced contact centers.

experiences.title: Sr. Director, Channel Development
experiences.description:
(acquired by Bridgevine)

Built and led the initial account management team responsible for the on-boarding, growth, expansion and renewal of all Channel Partners. Program focused on on-boarding, growing and expanding revenue driven by channel partners focused on broadband, voice and video solutions.

experiences.title: Associate Director, National Retail Channel
experiences.description: Developed and launched initial channel distribution partnerships with the leading, big-box retailers and national OEM consumer electronics firms to enhance the sale of AT&T broadband and bundled services. Directed all channel partnership marketing activities from contract negotiation and execution to new and continuing marketing and sales initiatives.

experiences.title: Regional Account Manager
experiences.description: Early stage Application Service Provider (ASP). Sold hosted software solutions and consulting services to start ups. (Company went out of business)

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin

volunteer_work.title: General Volunteer
volunteer_work.description: Volunteer for annual music festival in Austin. Volunteer efforts primarily focused on providing attending festival goers a unique and uplifting experience while attending 6 days of music, food and culture.
